answers.answer: The diastolic function of the heart  relates to the relaxation and filling of the heart.  It can progress and various types of heart problems are associated with diastolic dysfunction.Diabetes can cause both autonomic neuropathy and diastolic dysfunction but iI don't know if isolated autonomic neuropathy can cause the problem.

question: Diastolic dysfunction - what effect does this have on the operation of the heart? Is there a progression to the problem?  Is anything needed to be done for it?  Does autonomic neuropathy have any effect on this?
title: Diastolic dysfunction
